comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Thanks Wystan. According to the Hartford Courant (Oct. 25, 1914),  Justice Charles S. Kelby was the judge in the trial of Mrs. Edwin Carman for the murder of Lulu Bailey.  We will add his fuller name to the image description.
